name: M O R E
description:
My second Ludum Dare entry.

You play as an innocent little Rectangle that's trying to feed "The Maw" that grows hungrier and hungrier to prevent yourself from getting eaten.

Try to Score as many points as possible by feeding the glowing Point Dudes to it before the time runs out.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Pick up Point Dude

Enter - Feed to the Maw

Q - Temporary speed boost

R - Pick up all Point Dudes in a large radius

ESC - quit game
